verses.verse: <S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> who <S%H935>comes<s%> from <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> With <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H9144>glowing<s%> <S%H9144>colors<s%> from <S%H1224>Bozrah,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H2088>One<s%> who is <S%H1921>majestic<s%> in His <S%H3830>apparel,<s%> <S%H6808>Marching<s%> in the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of His <S%H3581>strength<s%>? "It is I who <S%H1696>speak<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H7227>mighty<s%> to <S%H3467>save.<s%>"
<S%H4069>Why<s%> is Your <S%H3830>apparel<s%> <S%H122>red,<s%> And Your <S%H899>garments<s%> like the one who <S%H1869>treads<s%> in the <S%H1660>wine<s%> <S%H1660>press<s%>?

"I have <S%H1869>trodden<s%> the <S%H6333>wine<s%> <S%H6333>trough<s%> <S%H905>alone,<s%> And from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> with Me. I also <S%H1869>trod<s%> them in My <S%H639>anger,<s%> And <S%H7429>trampled<s%> them in My <S%H2534>wrath;<s%> And their <S%H5332>lifeblood<s%> is <S%H5137>sprinkled<s%> on My <S%H899>garments,<s%> And I <S%H1351>stained<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H4403>raiment.<s%>
"For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> was in My <S%H3820>heart,<s%> And My <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H9067>redemption<s%> has <S%H935>come.<s%>

"And I <S%H5027>looked,<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H5826>help,<s%> And I was <S%H8074>astonished<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H5564>uphold;<s%> So My own <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H3467>brought<s%> <S%H3467>salvation<s%> to Me; And My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H5564>upheld<s%> Me.

"And I <S%H947>trod<s%> <S%H947>down<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> in My <S%H639>anger,<s%> And made them <S%H7937>drunk<s%> in My <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> And I <S%H3381>poured<s%> out their <S%H5332>lifeblood<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

I shall <S%H2142>make<s%> <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H5921>According<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1580>granted<s%> us, And the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness<s%> toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> He has <S%H1580>granted<s%> them according to His <S%H7356>compassion,<s%> And according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of His <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses.<s%>

For He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>"Surely,<s%> they are My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1121>Sons<s%> who will not <S%H8266>deal<s%> <S%H8266>falsely.<s%>" So He <S%H1961>became<s%> their <S%H3467>Savior.<s%>

In <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6869>affliction<s%> He was <S%H9496>afflicted,<s%> And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of His <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> them; In His <S%H160>love<s%> and in His <S%H2551>mercy<s%> He <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> them; And He <S%H5190>lifted<s%> them and <S%H5375>carried<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old.<s%>

But they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> And <S%H6087>grieved<s%> His <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit;<s%> Therefore, He <S%H2015>turned<s%> Himself to become their <S%H340>enemy,<s%> He <S%H3898>fought<s%> against them.

Then His <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> <S%H346>Where<s%> is He who <S%H5927>brought<s%> them up out of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> of His <S%H6629>flock<s%>? <S%H346>Where<s%> is He who <S%H7760>put<s%> His <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of them,

Who caused His <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> at the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> Who <S%H1234>divided<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them to <S%H6213>make<s%> for Himself an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%>
Who <S%H1980>led<s%> them through the <S%H8415>depths<s%>? Like the <S%H5483>horse<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> they did not <S%H3782>stumble;<s%>

As the <S%H929>cattle<s%> which <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H1237>valley,<s%> The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5117>gave<s%> them <S%H5117>rest.<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> didst Thou <S%H5090>lead<s%> Thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> To <S%H6213>make<s%> for Thyself a <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

<S%H5027>Look<s%> <S%H5027>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> from Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> and <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H2073>habitation;<s%> <S%H346>Where<s%> are Thy <S%H7068>zeal<s%> and Thy <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H1369>deeds<s%>? The <S%H1995>stirrings<s%> of Thy <S%H4578>heart<s%> and Thy <S%H7356>compassion<s%> are <S%H662>restrained<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> me.

For Thou art our Father, <S%H1>though<s%> <S%H3588>Abraham<s%> does not <S%H85>know<s%> us, And <S%H3045>Israel<s%> does not <S%H3478>recognize<s%> us. Thou, O <S%H5234>Lord,<s%> art our Father, Our <S%H3068>Redeemer<s%> from of <S%H1>old<s%> is Thy <S%H1350>name.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> dost Thou cause us to <S%H8582>stray<s%> from Thy <S%H1870>ways,<s%> And <S%H7188>harden<s%> our <S%H3820>heart<s%> from <S%H3374>fearing<s%> Thee? <S%H7725>Return<s%> for the <S%H4616>sake<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of Thy <S%H5159>heritage.<s%>

Thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3423>possessed<s%> Thy <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> for a <S%H4705>little<s%> <S%H4705>while,<s%> Our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> have <S%H947>trodden<s%> [it] <S%H947>down.<s%>
We have <S%H1961>become<s%> [like] those over whom Thou hast <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H4910>ruled,<s%> [Like] those who were not <S%H7121>called<s%> by Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
